content: So I was wondering, I don't know the extent to which it's possible to quantify this because I know you have a lot of costs associated with Chase vans and things like this that make it so that maybe these cost per mile figures that you're achieving right now maybe aren't perfectly apples-to-apples versus what they will be several years from now when you're in sort of pure autonomous mode. And just to clarify an earlier point and questions around the Navistar relationship and supply chain, and it sounds like you're saying that the industry's timeline to commercial deployment has shifted a little bit to the right based on issues with redundant steering or braking or some -- or a multitude of technical issues that really haven't been solved yet.
